name: Ice Mining Facility Mk3
description:
A game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 29.

Theme - Beneath the Surface.

Check out  POST-COMPO version of this game with some additional features and revamped gameplay


INSTRUCTIONS:

- You have to build mining machines to harvest the ice.

- Remember to build those solar panels to supply power.

- Clicking on a miner results in a temporary increase in it's efficiency.

- You can also upgrade the existing miners and solar panels if you ran out of space. 

- When your storage gets full, you have to send it directly into orbit using our quantum transportation relay.

- In reward you get more funds and storage to continue the operation.

Good Luck!

More info: Ludum Dare 29 Entry Page!
